places.name: Great Wall of China (Mutianyu)
places.description: Hike the restored watchtowers of this ancient wonder, offering breathtaking mountain views and fewer crowds than other sections.

places.name: The Palace Museum (Forbidden City)
places.description: Explore the colossal imperial palace complex that served as the home of emperors and their households for almost 500 years.

places.name: Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding
places.description: Watch adorable giant pandas and red pandas play in their natural habitat at this world-famous conservation center.

places.name: The Bund
places.description: Stroll along the waterfront promenade to see historic colonial architecture contrasting with the futuristic Pudong skyline.

places.name: Emperor Qinshihuang's Mausoleum Site Museum
places.description: Marvel at the thousands of life-sized clay soldiers, horses, and chariots buried to protect the first emperor of China.

places.name: Quanjude Roast Duck Restaurant
places.description: Savor the crispy skin and tender meat of authentic Peking Duck at China's most famous heritage restaurant chain.

places.name: Zhangjiajie National Forest Park
places.description: Wander among the towering sandstone pillars that inspired the floating mountains in the movie Avatar.

places.name: Li River Cruise
places.description: Drift past dramatic limestone karst mountains and sleepy villages on a scenic boat ride from Guilin to Yangshuo.

places.name: Temple of Heaven
places.description: Visit this architectural masterpiece where emperors prayed for good harvests, surrounded by a lively park full of locals practicing tai chi.

places.name: Impression Sanjie Liu
places.description: Watch a spectacular night show set directly on the Li River, featuring hundreds of performers and dramatic light effects.

places.description: Popular tour attraction in Toronto

places.name: Eiffel Tower
places.description: Ascend the Iron Lady for breathtaking panoramic views of Paris, especially magical when sparkling at night.

places.name: Louvre Museum
places.description: Explore the world's largest art museum, home to the Mona Lisa and thousands of historical masterpieces.

places.name: Palace of Versailles
places.description: Step back into royal history with opulent halls, the Hall of Mirrors, and vast manicured gardens.

places.name: Seine River Cruise
places.description: Glide past Paris's glowing monuments on a relaxing boat tour, perfect for sightseeing without the crowds.

places.name: Moulin Rouge
places.description: Experience the glitz and glamour of the world's most famous cabaret featuring the iconic can-can dance.

places.name: Mont Saint-Michel
places.description: Wander through a medieval abbey perched on a rocky island surrounded by sweeping tidal waters.

places.name: Jardin du Luxembourg
places.description: Relax in these classic French formal gardens featuring statues, fountains, and vintage toy sailboats.

places.name: Les Deux Magots
places.description: Sip coffee at this historic Saint-Germain café once frequented by Hemingway, Picasso, and Sartre.

places.name: Chamonix-Mont-Blanc
places.description: Hit the slopes or take the cable car up the Aiguille du Midi for Alpine views at the roof of Europe.

places.name: Carrières de Lumières
places.description: Walk inside an old quarry transformed into an immersive digital art show with music and giant projections.

places.name: Victoria Peak
places.description: Take the historic tram to the city's highest point for breathtaking panoramic views of the skyline and harbor.

places.name: Star Ferry
places.description: Cross Victoria Harbour on these charming green-and-white vessels for an iconic and affordable city experience.

places.name: Tian Tan Buddha
places.description: Climb 268 steps to reach the massive bronze Buddha statue on Lantau Island, adjacent to the Po Lin Monastery.

places.name: Temple Street Night Market
places.description: Explore this bustling open-air market famous for street food, souvenirs, opera singers, and fortune tellers.

places.name: M+ Museum
places.description: Visit Asia's first global museum of contemporary visual culture located in the West Kowloon Cultural District.

places.name: Dragon's Back Hike
places.description: Hike this popular ridge trail to enjoy stunning views of the South China Sea and lush coastal scenery.

places.name: Tim Ho Wan
places.description: Dine at the famous 'world's cheapest Michelin-star restaurant' known for its crispy BBQ pork buns.

places.name: Hong Kong Disneyland
places.description: Experience magical rides, meet beloved characters, and explore themed lands at this world-class theme park.

places.name: Man Mo Temple
places.description: Immerse yourself in history under large coiled incense cones at this atmospheric tribute to the gods of Literature and War.

places.name: Nan Lian Garden
places.description: Stroll through this serene, Tang Dynasty-style garden featuring wooden structures, water features, and bonsai trees.

places.name: Statue of Liberty
places.description: A colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island symbolizing freedom and democracy in the harbor.

places.name: Central Park
places.description: An urban oasis offering walking paths, a zoo, boat rentals, and lush green lawns in the center of Manhattan.

places.name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
places.description: One of the world's largest art museums, featuring over 5,000 years of art from around the globe.

places.name: Broadway Show
places.description: Experience world-class theatrical performances, musicals, and plays in the famous Theater District.

places.name: Empire State Building
places.description: An iconic Art Deco skyscraper offering breathtaking 360-degree views of the city from its observation decks.

places.name: The High Line
places.description: A unique public park built on a historic freight rail line elevated above the streets of Manhattan.

places.name: 9/11 Memorial & Museum
places.description: A solemn tribute honoring the victims of the 2001 attacks, featuring twin reflecting pools and historical exhibits.

places.name: Brooklyn Bridge
places.description: Walk across this historic suspension bridge for stunning panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline.

places.name: Chelsea Market
places.description: An enclosed urban food court and shopping mall offering diverse gourmet cuisines and unique shops.

places.name: Museum of Modern Art (MoMA)
places.description: Home to an impressive collection of modern and contemporary art, including Van Gogh's Starry Night.

places.name: Notre-Dame Basilica of Montreal
places.description: Witness a masterpiece of Gothic Revival architecture featuring dazzling blue interiors and intricate wood carvings.

places.name: Mount Royal Park
places.description: Hike or walk to the top of this urban mountain for panoramic city views and lush forest trails.

places.name: Old Montreal
places.description: Wander through cobblestone streets filled with historic 17th-century charm, boutiques, and lively plazas.

places.name: Montreal Museum of Fine Arts
places.description: Explore extensive collections of Canadian and international art in a sleek, multi-pavilion setting.

places.name: Schwartz's Deli
places.description: Taste the world-famous smoked meat sandwich at Canada's oldest deli, a true culinary institution.

places.name: Montreal Botanical Garden
places.description: Discover stunning themed gardens, from the peaceful Japanese garden to the impressive living plant sculptures.

places.name: La Grande Roue de Montréal
places.description: Ride Canada's tallest observation wheel for stunning 360-degree views of the St. Lawrence River and city.

places.name: Jean-Talon Market
places.description: Sample fresh produce, cheeses, and local treats at one of North America's largest open-air markets.

places.name: Saint Joseph's Oratory
places.description: Visit Canada's largest church, perched on a hill with a massive majestic dome and beautiful gardens.

places.name: Montreal Biodome
places.description: Walk through replicas of four distinct ecosystems, from tropical rainforests to polar ice caps.

places.name: Wieliczka Salt Mine
places.description: Explore underground chambers, chapels carved entirely from salt, and saline lakes in this UNESCO site.

places.name: Auschwitz-Birkenau Memorial
places.description: Pay respects at the former Nazi concentration camp, a solemn and essential reminder of WWII history.

places.name: Wawel Royal Castle
places.description: Discover the historic seat of Polish kings featuring stunning architecture, cathedral, and royal treasures.

places.name: Łazienki Królewskie Park
places.description: Stroll through Warsaw’s largest park featuring the Palace on the Isle, botanical gardens, and roaming peacocks.

places.name: Pierogarnia Zapiecek
places.description: Savor traditional Polish dumplings served by waitresses in folk costumes in a cozy, rustic setting.

places.name: Malbork Castle
places.description: Tour the largest brick castle in the world, a Gothic masterpiece built by the Teutonic Knights.

places.name: Morskie Oko
places.description: Hike to this breathtaking emerald-green lake nestled deep within the Tatra Mountains National Park.

places.name: Copernicus Science Centre
places.description: Engage with hundreds of hands-on exhibits exploring physics, biology, and robotics in a modern facility.

places.name: Pijalnia Wódki i Piwa
places.description: Experience a retro communist-era style bar serving cheap shots and traditional Polish bar snacks.

places.name: Kraków Main Market Square
places.description: Wander Europe's largest medieval square, home to the historic Cloth Hall and St. Mary's Basilica.

places.name: Historic Tokyo Walking Tour
places.description: Popular tour attraction in Tokyo

places.name: Tokyo City Museum
places.description: Popular museum attraction in Tokyo

places.name: Gateway of India
places.description: Mumbai's most iconic monument overlooking the Arabian Sea, built to commemorate a royal visit in 1911.

places.name: Elephanta Caves
places.description: Explore ancient rock-cut caves and sculptures dedicated to Lord Shiva on an island a ferry ride away.

places.name: Marine Drive
places.description: A C-shaped seaside promenade known as the Queen's Necklace, perfect for sunset walks and skyline views.

places.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya
places.description: A magnificent Indo-Saracenic museum housing thousands of rare artifacts, sculptures, and miniature paintings.

places.name: Bollywood Film City Tour
places.description: Go behind the scenes of the world's largest film industry with a guided tour of live movie sets.

places.name: Leopold Cafe
places.description: A legendary eatery founded in 1871, famous for its history, lively atmosphere, and literary fame.

places.name: Sree Siddhivinayak Ganapati Temple
places.description: One of India's richest and most famous temples, dedicated to Lord Ganesha, attracting thousands daily.

places.name: Sanjay Gandhi National Park
places.description: A massive protected forest within city limits featuring the ancient Kanheri Caves and lion safaris.

places.name: Colaba Causeway
places.description: A bustling street market offering everything from antique trinkets and jewelry to trendy clothes.

places.name: Haji Ali Dargah
places.description: A stunning white mosque and tomb located on an islet, accessible via a causeway only during low tide.

places.name: Taj Mahal
places.description: Marvel at this ivory-white marble mausoleum in Agra, a UNESCO World Heritage site and symbol of eternal love.

places.name: Ranthambore National Park Safari
places.description: Explore the wilderness in an open jeep to spot Bengal tigers and diverse wildlife in their natural habitat.

places.name: Kerala Backwaters Houseboat
places.description: Cruise through serene palm-fringed canals in Alleppey on a traditional thatch-roofed boat known as a Kettuvallam.

places.name: Amber Fort
places.description: Explore this majestic hilltop fort in Jaipur blending Hindu and Mughal architecture with stunning city views.

places.name: Bukhara
places.description: Savor world-famous Dal Bukhara and tandoori cuisine at this iconic restaurant favored by global dignitaries.

places.name: Ganges River Boat Ride and Aarti
places.description: Witness spiritual rituals and the famous Ganga Aarti ceremony at sunset from a boat on the holy river in Varanasi.

places.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya
places.description: Admire extensive collections of art, archaeology, and natural history in a stunning Indo-Saracenic building.

places.name: Parmarth Niketan Ashram Yoga
places.description: Rejuvenate your mind and body with meditation and yoga sessions in Rishikesh, the Yoga Capital of the World.

places.name: Bollywood Studio Tour
places.description: Go behind the scenes of the world's largest film industry in Mumbai, visit sets, and watch live filming.

places.name: Meenakshi Amman Temple
places.description: Walk through the colorful, towering gopurams and intricate carvings of this historic temple city in Madurai.

places.name: Stanley Park
places.description: Explore this massive urban oasis featuring totem poles, beaches, and ancient cedars surrounded by water.

places.name: Capilano Suspension Bridge Park
places.description: Walk across the swaying bridge suspended 230 feet above the river and explore the treetop adventures.

places.name: Granville Island Public Market
places.description: Wander through a bustling market filled with fresh produce, artisan crafts, and delicious local food stalls.

places.name: Museum of Anthropology at UBC
places.description: Discover world-renowned displays of Northwest Coast First Nations art in a stunning architectural setting.

places.name: Grouse Mountain
places.description: Take the Skyride gondola up for breathtaking city views, lumberjack shows, and grizzly bear habitats.

places.name: Gastown Steam Clock
places.description: Watch steam pour from this Victorian-style clock every 15 minutes in the heart of the historic district.

places.name: FlyOver Canada
places.description: Experience a flight simulation ride that takes you on an aerial journey across Canada's spectacular landscapes.

places.name: Science World
places.description: Ignite your curiosity at this iconic geodesic dome filled with interactive exhibits and scientific displays.

places.name: Miku Vancouver
places.description: Indulge in famous Aburi-style flame-seared sushi while enjoying panoramic views of the Vancouver harbour.

places.name: Vancouver Seawall
places.description: Cycle or jog along the world's longest uninterrupted waterfront path offering stunning ocean and city views.

places.name: Red Fort
places.description: Explore the majestic red sandstone fortress of the Mughal emperors, a massive UNESCO World Heritage site.

places.name: Chandni Chowk Rickshaw Tour
places.description: Navigate the chaotic, vibrant narrow lanes of Old Delhi's oldest market on a traditional cycle rickshaw.

places.name: Qutub Minar
places.description: Marvel at the world's tallest brick minaret, a victory tower surrounded by ancient ruins and intricate carvings.

places.name: Lodhi Gardens
places.description: Stroll through lush greenery dotted with 15th-century tombs, a favorite spot for morning walks and picnics.

places.name: Akshardham Temple
places.description: Experience spiritual grandeur, boat rides, and a stunning water show at this massive modern temple complex.

places.name: Hauz Khas Village
places.description: Enjoy trendy boutiques, rooftop cafes, and vibrant bars set amidst medieval ruins and a deer park.

places.name: Lotus Temple
places.description: Meditate in the serene, flower-shaped Bahá'í House of Worship known for its striking white marble petals.

places.name: Dilli Haat INA
places.description: Shop for regional handicrafts and taste authentic cuisines from every Indian state in this open-air bazaar.

places.name: National Museum
places.description: Journey through 5,000 years of Indian history with rare artifacts ranging from the Harappan era to Mughal art.

places.name: Bukhara
places.description: Indulge in world-famous Dal Bukhara and kebabs at this legendary, rustic-chic restaurant in the ITC Maurya.

places.name: Lake Louise
places.description: Marvel at the turquoise waters and soaring mountain peaks of this world-famous alpine lake.

places.name: Banff Gondola
places.description: Soar to the top of Sulphur Mountain for breathtaking panoramic views of six mountain ranges.

places.name: Johnston Canyon
places.description: Walk along steel catwalks attached to limestone walls to witness thundering waterfalls.

places.name: Banff Upper Hot Springs
places.description: Soak in the steaming mineral waters while gazing at the stunning Rundle Mountain.

places.name: Moraine Lake
places.description: Experience the Valley of the Ten Peaks reflected in the intense shade of turquoise water.

places.name: The Grizzly House
places.description: Enjoy a unique fondue dining experience in a rustic, historic setting with exotic meats.

places.name: Whyte Museum of the Canadian Rockies
places.description: Explore the art, culture, and history of the Rocky Mountains through captivating exhibits.

places.name: Cave and Basin National Historic Site
places.description: Visit the birthplace of Canada's national parks and see the thermal springs inside a cave.

places.name: Lake Minnewanka Cruise
places.description: Take a guided boat tour across Banff’s largest lake to learn about local legends and wildlife.

places.name: Fairmont Banff Springs
places.description: Visit the "Castle in the Rockies" to admire its architecture or enjoy a luxurious afternoon tea.

places.name: Maligne Lake Cruise
places.description: Cruise across azure waters to Spirit Island, one of the most photographed spots in the Canadian Rockies.

places.name: Jasper SkyTram
places.description: Ride Canada's highest and longest guided aerial tramway for breathtaking panoramic mountain views.

places.name: Maligne Canyon
places.description: Explore the deepest canyon in the park with limestone walls, rushing water, and scenic bridges.

places.name: Athabasca Falls
places.description: Witness the raw power of this Class 5 waterfall as it thunders through a narrow gorge.

places.name: Miette Hot Springs
places.description: Soak in the hottest mineral springs in the Canadian Rockies while surrounded by mountain peaks.

places.name: Jasper Planetarium
places.description: Experience the world's second-largest Dark Sky Preserve with guided telescope tours and dome shows.

places.name: Jasper Yellowhead Museum & Archives
places.description: Discover the rich history of the area, from fur trade exploration to railway construction.

places.name: The Emerald Lounge
places.description: Enjoy upscale dining and cocktails with a stunning view of Lac Beauvert at the Fairmont.

places.name: Mount Edith Cavell
places.description: Hike the Path of the Glacier trail to see Angel Glacier hanging dramatically over a pond.

places.name: Jasper Raft Tours
places.description: Float down the Athabasca River on a gentle, guided raft tour perfect for spotting local wildlife.

places.name: Eiffel Tower
places.description: Ascend the Iron Lady for breathtaking panoramic views of the City of Light from its observation decks.

places.name: Louvre Museum
places.description: Explore the world's largest art museum, home to the Mona Lisa and thousands of historic masterpieces.

places.name: Seine River Cruise
places.description: Drift past illuminated monuments like Notre Dame on a relaxing boat ride through the heart of Paris.

places.name: Luxembourg Gardens
places.description: Stroll through manicured lawns, statues, and fountains in this beloved park near the Latin Quarter.

places.name: Moulin Rouge
places.description: Experience the glitz, glamour, and the famous can-can dance at the world's most iconic cabaret.

places.name: Musée d'Orsay
places.description: Wander through a stunning Beaux-Arts railway station filled with the world's best Impressionist art.

places.name: Café de Flore
places.description: Sip hot chocolate at this historic Saint-Germain café once frequented by famous writers and philosophers.

places.name: Arc de Triomphe
places.description: Climb to the rooftop of this massive triumphal arch for the best view of the Champs-Élysées.

places.name: Sainte-Chapelle
places.description: Marvel at 1,113 scenes depicted in towering stained glass windows within this Gothic royal chapel.

places.name: Montmartre Walking Tour
places.description: Explore the artistic hilltop village, cobblestone streets, and the white basilica of Sacré-Cœur.

activities.name: Wieliczka Salt Mine
activities.description: Explore underground chambers, chapels carved entirely from salt, and saline lakes in this UNESCO site.

activities.name: Auschwitz-Birkenau Memorial
activities.description: Pay respects at the former Nazi concentration camp, a solemn and essential reminder of WWII history.

activities.name: Wawel Royal Castle
activities.description: Discover the historic seat of Polish kings featuring stunning architecture, cathedral, and royal treasures.

activities.name: Łazienki Królewskie Park
activities.description: Stroll through Warsaw’s largest park featuring the Palace on the Isle, botanical gardens, and roaming peacocks.

activities.name: Pierogarnia Zapiecek
activities.description: Savor traditional Polish dumplings served by waitresses in folk costumes in a cozy, rustic setting.

activities.name: Malbork Castle
activities.description: Tour the largest brick castle in the world, a Gothic masterpiece built by the Teutonic Knights.

activities.name: Morskie Oko
activities.description: Hike to this breathtaking emerald-green lake nestled deep within the Tatra Mountains National Park.

activities.name: Copernicus Science Centre
activities.description: Engage with hundreds of hands-on exhibits exploring physics, biology, and robotics in a modern facility.

activities.name: Pijalnia Wódki i Piwa
activities.description: Experience a retro communist-era style bar serving cheap shots and traditional Polish bar snacks.

activities.name: Kraków Main Market Square
activities.description: Wander Europe's largest medieval square, home to the historic Cloth Hall and St. Mary's Basilica.

activities.name: Historic Tokyo Walking Tour
activities.description: Popular tour attraction in Tokyo

activities.name: Tokyo City Museum
activities.description: Popular museum attraction in Tokyo

activities.name: Central Tokyo Park
activities.description: Popular park attraction in Tokyo

activities.name: Tokyo Main Cathedral
activities.description: Popular temple attraction in Tokyo

activities.name: Local Tokyo Market
activities.description: Popular attraction attraction in Tokyo

activities.name: Traditional Tokyo Restaurant
activities.description: Popular restaurant attraction in Tokyo

activities.name: Tokyo Art Gallery
activities.description: Popular museum attraction in Tokyo

activities.name: Tokyo Riverfront Cruise
activities.description: Popular tour attraction in Tokyo

activities.name: Tokyo Night Entertainment
activities.description: Popular entertainment attraction in Tokyo

activities.name: Tokyo Viewpoint Tower
activities.description: Popular landmark attraction in Tokyo

activities.name: Gateway of India
activities.description: Mumbai's most iconic monument overlooking the Arabian Sea, built to commemorate a royal visit in 1911.

activities.name: Elephanta Caves
activities.description: Explore ancient rock-cut caves and sculptures dedicated to Lord Shiva on an island a ferry ride away.

activities.name: Marine Drive
activities.description: A C-shaped seaside promenade known as the Queen's Necklace, perfect for sunset walks and skyline views.

activities.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya
activities.description: A magnificent Indo-Saracenic museum housing thousands of rare artifacts, sculptures, and miniature paintings.

activities.name: Bollywood Film City Tour
activities.description: Go behind the scenes of the world's largest film industry with a guided tour of live movie sets.

activities.name: Leopold Cafe
activities.description: A legendary eatery founded in 1871, famous for its history, lively atmosphere, and literary fame.

activities.name: Sree Siddhivinayak Ganapati Temple
activities.description: One of India's richest and most famous temples, dedicated to Lord Ganesha, attracting thousands daily.

activities.name: Sanjay Gandhi National Park
activities.description: A massive protected forest within city limits featuring the ancient Kanheri Caves and lion safaris.

activities.name: Colaba Causeway
activities.description: A bustling street market offering everything from antique trinkets and jewelry to trendy clothes.

activities.name: Haji Ali Dargah
activities.description: A stunning white mosque and tomb located on an islet, accessible via a causeway only during low tide.

activities.name: Taj Mahal
activities.description: Marvel at this ivory-white marble mausoleum in Agra, a UNESCO World Heritage site and symbol of eternal love.

activities.name: Ranthambore National Park Safari
activities.description: Explore the wilderness in an open jeep to spot Bengal tigers and diverse wildlife in their natural habitat.

activities.name: Kerala Backwaters Houseboat
activities.description: Cruise through serene palm-fringed canals in Alleppey on a traditional thatch-roofed boat known as a Kettuvallam.

activities.name: Amber Fort
activities.description: Explore this majestic hilltop fort in Jaipur blending Hindu and Mughal architecture with stunning city views.

activities.name: Bukhara
activities.description: Savor world-famous Dal Bukhara and tandoori cuisine at this iconic restaurant favored by global dignitaries.

activities.name: Ganges River Boat Ride and Aarti
activities.description: Witness spiritual rituals and the famous Ganga Aarti ceremony at sunset from a boat on the holy river in Varanasi.

activities.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya
activities.description: Admire extensive collections of art, archaeology, and natural history in a stunning Indo-Saracenic building.

activities.name: Parmarth Niketan Ashram Yoga
activities.description: Rejuvenate your mind and body with meditation and yoga sessions in Rishikesh, the Yoga Capital of the World.

activities.name: Bollywood Studio Tour
activities.description: Go behind the scenes of the world's largest film industry in Mumbai, visit sets, and watch live filming.

activities.name: Meenakshi Amman Temple
activities.description: Walk through the colorful, towering gopurams and intricate carvings of this historic temple city in Madurai.

activities.name: Stanley Park
activities.description: Explore this massive urban oasis featuring totem poles, beaches, and ancient cedars surrounded by water.

activities.name: Capilano Suspension Bridge Park
activities.description: Walk across the swaying bridge suspended 230 feet above the river and explore the treetop adventures.

activities.name: Granville Island Public Market
activities.description: Wander through a bustling market filled with fresh produce, artisan crafts, and delicious local food stalls.

activities.name: Museum of Anthropology at UBC
activities.description: Discover world-renowned displays of Northwest Coast First Nations art in a stunning architectural setting.

activities.name: Grouse Mountain
activities.description: Take the Skyride gondola up for breathtaking city views, lumberjack shows, and grizzly bear habitats.

activities.name: Gastown Steam Clock
activities.description: Watch steam pour from this Victorian-style clock every 15 minutes in the heart of the historic district.

activities.name: FlyOver Canada
activities.description: Experience a flight simulation ride that takes you on an aerial journey across Canada's spectacular landscapes.

activities.name: Science World
activities.description: Ignite your curiosity at this iconic geodesic dome filled with interactive exhibits and scientific displays.

activities.name: Miku Vancouver
activities.description: Indulge in famous Aburi-style flame-seared sushi while enjoying panoramic views of the Vancouver harbour.

activities.name: Vancouver Seawall
activities.description: Cycle or jog along the world's longest uninterrupted waterfront path offering stunning ocean and city views.

activities.name: Red Fort
activities.description: Explore the majestic red sandstone fortress of the Mughal emperors, a massive UNESCO World Heritage site.

activities.name: Chandni Chowk Rickshaw Tour
activities.description: Navigate the chaotic, vibrant narrow lanes of Old Delhi's oldest market on a traditional cycle rickshaw.

activities.name: Qutub Minar
activities.description: Marvel at the world's tallest brick minaret, a victory tower surrounded by ancient ruins and intricate carvings.

activities.name: Lodhi Gardens
activities.description: Stroll through lush greenery dotted with 15th-century tombs, a favorite spot for morning walks and picnics.

activities.name: Akshardham Temple
activities.description: Experience spiritual grandeur, boat rides, and a stunning water show at this massive modern temple complex.

activities.name: Hauz Khas Village
activities.description: Enjoy trendy boutiques, rooftop cafes, and vibrant bars set amidst medieval ruins and a deer park.

activities.name: Lotus Temple
activities.description: Meditate in the serene, flower-shaped Bahá'í House of Worship known for its striking white marble petals.

activities.name: Dilli Haat INA
activities.description: Shop for regional handicrafts and taste authentic cuisines from every Indian state in this open-air bazaar.

activities.name: National Museum
activities.description: Journey through 5,000 years of Indian history with rare artifacts ranging from the Harappan era to Mughal art.

activities.name: Bukhara
activities.description: Indulge in world-famous Dal Bukhara and kebabs at this legendary, rustic-chic restaurant in the ITC Maurya.

activities.name: Lake Louise
activities.description: Marvel at the turquoise waters and soaring mountain peaks of this world-famous alpine lake.

activities.name: Banff Gondola
activities.description: Soar to the top of Sulphur Mountain for breathtaking panoramic views of six mountain ranges.

activities.name: Johnston Canyon
activities.description: Walk along steel catwalks attached to limestone walls to witness thundering waterfalls.

activities.name: Banff Upper Hot Springs
activities.description: Soak in the steaming mineral waters while gazing at the stunning Rundle Mountain.

activities.name: Moraine Lake
activities.description: Experience the Valley of the Ten Peaks reflected in the intense shade of turquoise water.

activities.name: The Grizzly House
activities.description: Enjoy a unique fondue dining experience in a rustic, historic setting with exotic meats.

activities.name: Whyte Museum of the Canadian Rockies
activities.description: Explore the art, culture, and history of the Rocky Mountains through captivating exhibits.

activities.name: Cave and Basin National Historic Site
activities.description: Visit the birthplace of Canada's national parks and see the thermal springs inside a cave.

activities.name: Lake Minnewanka Cruise
activities.description: Take a guided boat tour across Banff’s largest lake to learn about local legends and wildlife.

activities.name: Fairmont Banff Springs
activities.description: Visit the "Castle in the Rockies" to admire its architecture or enjoy a luxurious afternoon tea.

activities.name: Maligne Lake Cruise
activities.description: Cruise across azure waters to Spirit Island, one of the most photographed spots in the Canadian Rockies.

activities.name: Jasper SkyTram
activities.description: Ride Canada's highest and longest guided aerial tramway for breathtaking panoramic mountain views.

activities.name: Maligne Canyon
activities.description: Explore the deepest canyon in the park with limestone walls, rushing water, and scenic bridges.

activities.name: Athabasca Falls
activities.description: Witness the raw power of this Class 5 waterfall as it thunders through a narrow gorge.

activities.name: Miette Hot Springs
activities.description: Soak in the hottest mineral springs in the Canadian Rockies while surrounded by mountain peaks.

activities.name: Jasper Planetarium
activities.description: Experience the world's second-largest Dark Sky Preserve with guided telescope tours and dome shows.

activities.name: Jasper Yellowhead Museum & Archives
activities.description: Discover the rich history of the area, from fur trade exploration to railway construction.

activities.name: The Emerald Lounge
activities.description: Enjoy upscale dining and cocktails with a stunning view of Lac Beauvert at the Fairmont.

activities.name: Mount Edith Cavell
activities.description: Hike the Path of the Glacier trail to see Angel Glacier hanging dramatically over a pond.

activities.name: Jasper Raft Tours
activities.description: Float down the Athabasca River on a gentle, guided raft tour perfect for spotting local wildlife.

activities.name: Eiffel Tower
activities.description: Ascend the Iron Lady for breathtaking panoramic views of the City of Light from its observation decks.

activities.name: Louvre Museum
activities.description: Explore the world's largest art museum, home to the Mona Lisa and thousands of historic masterpieces.

activities.name: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Drift past illuminated monuments like Notre Dame on a relaxing boat ride through the heart of Paris.

activities.name: Luxembourg Gardens
activities.description: Stroll through manicured lawns, statues, and fountains in this beloved park near the Latin Quarter.

activities.name: Moulin Rouge
activities.description: Experience the glitz, glamour, and the famous can-can dance at the world's most iconic cabaret.

activities.name: Musée d'Orsay
activities.description: Wander through a stunning Beaux-Arts railway station filled with the world's best Impressionist art.

activities.name: Café de Flore
activities.description: Sip hot chocolate at this historic Saint-Germain café once frequented by famous writers and philosophers.

activities.name: Arc de Triomphe
activities.description: Climb to the rooftop of this massive triumphal arch for the best view of the Champs-Élysées.

activities.name: Sainte-Chapelle
activities.description: Marvel at 1,113 scenes depicted in towering stained glass windows within this Gothic royal chapel.

activities.name: Montmartre Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore the artistic hilltop village, cobblestone streets, and the white basilica of Sacré-Cœur.
